title: 1895 N300  Graded Mayo's For Sale or Trade
author: Donscards

posts.post_title: 1895 N300  Graded Mayo's For Sale or Trade
posts.post_content: I have a nice group of 1895 Mayo Cut Plugs for Sale or Trade----SGC 60 Kid Nichols $6000---SGC 40 Wilbert Robinson $1600---SGC 60 Amos Russie $4000---SGC 30 Haddock (phil) $300---SGC 40 McCarthy $1400--SGC 40 Latham $400---SGC 50 Foutz $450---SGC 50 Yale Murphy $500  SGC 50 Brickyard Kennedy $800---SGC 10 McCarthy $550----I can provide scans if desired---In trade I am looking for Graded T-205--T206--Ramlys--Goudeys--etc.---any questions, you can email me at [url]dhontz1@maine.rr.com[/url]----thanks,  Don
I like Nichols uniform there. It looks like a prison uniform. Best of luck with the sale.
